flexlm¶

flexlm is shell tool for operating Flex License Manager.

Developed in bash code: 100%.

The README is used to introduce the tool and provide instructions on how to install the tool, any machine dependencies it may have and any other information that should be provided before the tool is installed.

Installation¶

Navigate to release page download and extract release archive.

To install flexlm type the following

tar xvzf flexlm-x.y.tar.gz
cd flexlm-x.y
cp -R ~/sh_tool/bin/   /root/scripts/flexlm/ver.x.y/
cp -R ~/sh_tool/conf/  /root/scripts/flexlm/ver.x.y/
cp -R ~/sh_tool/log/   /root/scripts/flexlm/ver.x.y/

Or You can use Docker to create image/container.

Dependencies¶

flexlm requires next modules and libraries

sh_util https://github.com/vroncevic/sh_util

Shell tool structure¶

flexlm is based on MOP.

Shell tool structure

sh_tool/
├── bin/
│   ├── center.sh
│   ├── check_license.sh
│   ├── display_logo.sh
│   ├── flexlm.sh
│   ├── load_licenses.sh
│   ├── start_license.sh
│   └── stop_license.sh
├── conf/
│   ├── flexlm.cfg
│   ├── flexlm.logo
│   ├── flexlm_util.cfg
│   └── licenses.cfg
└── log/
    └── flexlm.log
